history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01023
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR THE MAGNA CARTA FOR LOCAL CIVIL REGISTRY PERSONNEL AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Gives more authority to local government, improves the economic status of civil registry personnel, defining their functions, and develops their skills.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BATAOIL, LEOPOLDO N.
DATE FILED : 2016-07-04
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Vargas (024 2016-09-20)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON JUSTICE ON 2016-08-01
